attributes.action: Put it to a public vote to decide who we want as lords in the house of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Put it to a public vote to decide who we want as lords in the house of Lords

...and not have a PM or others use it as a way for disgraced mps to come through the back door and back into a position of power bypassing our democratic process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
